channel.title: Runescape 2006 website VERSION 1.1 IS OUT! (90% kbase, alot of pages, ...)
channel.description:
hi guys
Today im bringing you guys my 2006 website with 90% knowledge base + alot of pages added into it. I think its a good release :) so i uploaded it yesterday aswell but i made a huge mistake in it.
Explaining my fault: so i uploaded the normal rsc 1.5 to my website and started to edit it and when it was finally finished, i tought "o if i download it, than it must be fine" but i forgotted that the site was setted to my database, so everytime if someone else tried to install it, he wil get a database error. It was really a dumb mistake of me and I AM VERY SORRY FOR IT.
I made a proof video of the site that u can see it works now 100%, as you can see in the video i dont have any databases so if the fault was still there i will got a error but i didnt get the error :) so its works fine now. (i also show a little features in it)
[center][b]VERSION 1.1 RELEASED!!! Updates: - Fixed main menu in Knowledge base: its goes now to yoursite.com/index.php and not to title.html. - Found how to change "runescape" in all the pages at the same time. (Tutorial is coming!) - Some minor bug fixes.[/b][/center]
Video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XcLGJ73HEm8&feature=youtu.be
Download link:*
[center][b]TUTORIAL:[/b][/center]
Tutorial on how to change "runescape" to your own server name: Search for: [b]yourserver[/b] in notepad ++ Notepad ++ Download page: http://notepad-plus-plus.org/download/v6.4.2.html
video:http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ullm8KkbNyU&feature=youtu.be
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Proof video: [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VVIhIXtY3pE&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]
my video from yesterday with features in it: [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FybtrHSJzjU[/youtube]
Download link: *
Hope you guys enjoy it :)
Credits: 85% SRBuckey5266 15% Get_a_life (me)
PS: SRBuckey5266 if u don't wanna see this here, pleas comment or PM me than, ill try to remove it ASAP than + Mod pleas remove my post from yesterday, thank you.
